bibl.title: The New Jewish Inscriptions from Hierapolis and the Question of Jewish Diaspora Cemeteries.
bibl.note: Urges that stricter principles should be observed in identifying inscriptions (almost exclusively epitaphs) as Jewish. Comments in part. on epitaphs from Herakleopolis (Egypt).
bibl.seg: ILAN Tal, The New Jewish Inscriptions from Hierapolis and the Question of Jewish Diaspora Cemeteries.
Urges that stricter principles should be observed in identifying inscriptions (almost exclusively epitaphs) as Jewish. Comments in part. on epitaphs from Herakleopolis (Egypt).
